labels.thankYouForSharing: Thank you for sharing what God has done. Your testimony matters!
labels.welcomeMessage: We are happy to welcome you to the testimony platform of ACER churches in the North-West zone. Whether you are a member of one of our assemblies or a visitor, know that your testimony will be a blessing to us. Indeed, we serve a God who does wonderful works in our lives. That is why we want to make known His greatness and faithfulness from generation to generation.
labels.revelationText: "They overcame him by the blood of the Lamb and by the word of their testimony, and they did not love their lives so much as to shrink from death"
labels.revelationVerse: They overcame him by the blood of the Lamb and by the word of their testimony, and they did not love their lives so much as to shrink from death

progress100: 🎉 Congratulations! Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members. The goal is reached! You have done remarkable work!
🏆 Well done! Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members. You have exceeded all expectations! Keep up the momentum!
✨ Excellent work! Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members. The goal is not only reached but exceeded!
progress90: 🔥 Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members. {remaining} members remaining. You're almost there! Don't give up!
💪 Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members. {remaining} members and {days} days remaining. Almost at the finish line! Don't relax your efforts now!
⭐ Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members. {days} days remaining. Just a few steps from victory! Keep it up!
progress75: 🚀 Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members. {remaining} members and {days} days remaining. Excellent progress! You're on the right track!
📈 Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members ({progress}%). {days} days remaining. You're moving very well! Keep this pace!
💎 Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members. {remaining} members remaining. Remarkable progress! The goal is within reach!
progress50: 👍 Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members ({progress}%). {remaining} members and {days} days remaining. Good progress! You're halfway there, keep going!
💼 Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members. {remaining} members and {days} days remaining. You're progressing well! Half the journey is already covered!
📊 Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members ({progress}%). {days} days remaining. Halfway there! Maintain your efforts to reach the goal!
progress25: 🌱 Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members ({progress}%). {remaining} members and {days} days remaining. You've made a good start! Continue on this path!
🎯 Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members. {remaining} members and {days} days remaining. Good start! Every member counts, don't give up!
💫 Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members ({progress}%). {days} days remaining. You're on the right track! Persevere and you'll get there!
progressDefault: 🌟 Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members. {remaining} members and {days} days remaining. Every step counts! Don't give up, you'll make it!
💪 Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members ({progress}%). {days} days remaining. The beginning is always the hardest, keep going!
🌿 Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members. {remaining} members and {days} days remaining. Growth takes time, be patient and persevering!

urgent: ⚠️ Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members ({progress}%). Only {days} days left and you're less than halfway. Speed up!
⏰ Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members. {remaining} members and only {days} days remaining. Urgency! Mobilize all your forces!
🚨 Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members ({progress}%). {days} days remaining. Final stretch! You need to redouble your efforts to reach the goal!
critical: ⏳ Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members ({progress}%). {remaining} members and {days} days remaining. It's time to accelerate!
📅 Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members. {remaining} members and {days} days remaining. It's still possible, act now!
🎯 Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members ({progress}%). {days} days remaining. You need to intensify your efforts to get there!
alert: 📊 Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members ({progress}%). {remaining} members and {days} days remaining. You need to redouble your efforts!
⏰ Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members. {remaining} members and {days} days remaining. Speed up!
💼 Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members ({progress}%). {days} days remaining. You can make it, but you need to intensify your actions!
default: 📉 Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members ({progress}%). {remaining} members and {days} days remaining. Progress is below expectations. It's time to react!
⚠️ Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members. {remaining} members and {days} days remaining. Watch the progress! Don't let the delay accumulate!
🔔 Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members ({progress}%). {days} days remaining. You need to accelerate to reach the goal on time!

excellent: ✅ Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members ({progress}%). {remaining} members and {days} days remaining. Excellent progress! You still have time, keep it up!
🎯 Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members. {remaining} members and {days} days remaining. On the right track! With the time remaining, the goal is within your reach!
💎 Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members ({progress}%). {days} days remaining. Solid progress! You're well positioned to reach the goal!

👍 Goal: {target} members. Currently: {current} members. {remaining} members and {days} days remaining. You're progressing well! Keep up the momentum!
